title.rendered: Prestige Motorcars New Showroom GRAND OPENING!

content.rendered:
Salah satu momen paling berkesan di tahun 2020 bagi Prestige. Berawal dari cita-cita untuk menciptakan “showroom supercar yang ramah”, kami berhasil meresmikan showroom baru di tengah pandemi ini. Acara Soft Opening digelar pada tanggal 5 September 2020, di Showroom Prestige Motorcars yang berlokasi di Jl. Pluit Selatan Raya No.8a, Jakarta Utara. Acara turut dimeriahkan oleh Syahrini, beberapa influencer, serta tamu kehormatan termasuk Ketua MPR RI Bapak Bambang Soesatyo. Selain itu ada Assetto Corsa dan Gokart Time Attack Competition dengan hadiah utama sepeda Brompton! Kami sangat gembira karena sukses mempersembahkan acara megah namun tetap mematuhi protokol kesehatan. Sehat selalu dan sampai jumpa di event berikutnya! / Prestige Motorcars opened its new showroom doors on the 5th of September, celebrating the Grand Opening with great people from numerous car clubs. We we’re also grateful to have a very special guest performance by Princess Syahrini. Topped off with an indoor gokart as well as Assetto Corsa competition, it was definitely a Grand Opening to remember. Our doors are now open to the public so come for a visit and experience our new showroom!
